title: Champ points?
body:
I'm confused.
Some of my champions get champion points and lvl up like normal. But some of my other champs don't seem to gain champion points at all. 
So my question is how do you get champion points.

Help would be great, thanks.

replies.body:
Yep, that fixed it. All I had to do was play pvp and not bots.
Still thanks for the help guys?

Ok, I'm stupid, think I found the problem. I've been fighting bots and not pvp, mayhaps you don't get mastery for bots. Cause lookin back I haven't used Nasus sence I started practicing on bots. And Warwick I've only used on bots.

So you go into a game and complete it and you don't get any points what so ever on the champion  you used? 


{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}

It depends.
When I play as Nasus he gains points, but as Garen or Warwick I don't.
I've done like ten normal battles as Warwick and gained 0 champion points. So I was thinking maybe winning isn't how points are earned, maybe you have to kill champs or somethin? Or the increase is so tiny I can't notice it. Like 5 pts or somethin crazy like that.

Ps. My record champ kills is 2, average 0.

Hey The Lone Crusade,

You only gain Champion Mastery Points from 5v5 Summoner's Rift Normal/Ranked matches. This means Summoner's Rift Normal Blind Pick, Normal Draft Pick, Team Builder, Ranked Solo/Duo Queue, and Ranked 5v5's. 

For more information about the Champion Mastery System, check out the [**Champion Mastery Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q6) Riot Games Support article!
